citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:30 AM on
6/24/25.
The inspector arrived at 11:30 AM on 6/24/25 to conduct an inspection. The inspector contacted the Licensee by text
message and learned that they were at a distant off-site location and were not available today. An AWA compliance
inspection could not be conducted because there was no other authorized facility representative available to accompany
the inspector. This is the FIRST attempted inspection of the Licensee.
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:30 AM on 
6/24/25.  
 
The inspector arrived at 11:30 AM on 6/24/25 to conduct an inspection. The inspector contacted the Licensee by text 
message and learned that they were at a distant off-site location and were not available today. An AWA compliance 
inspection could not be conducted because there was no other authorized facility representative available to accompany 
the inspector. This is the FIRST attempted inspection of the Licensee.  
 
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and 
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
